v0.1.6, 2015-10-30 -- Bugfix in test.
v0.1.5, 2015-10-30 -- Can't use non-escaped dots for keys.
v0.1.4, 2015-08-21 -- Allow slicing in DottedLists.
v0.1.3, 2015-07-20 -- Can use escaped dots for keys. Bugfixes.
v0.1.2, 2015-01-19 -- Better tests thanks to Marc Abramowitz. Bugfixes.
v0.1.1, 2014-11-24 -- Fixed error when parsing a non JSON string (value).
v0.1.0, 2014-03-28 -- Initial release.
